config.query: select * from (select dr.id, dr.fhir, dr.effective_date_time, dr.effective_period, dr.fhir_version, gf.status_deleted, gf.inserted_when, tiv.creation_date as modified , gf.deleted_when from diagnostic_report dr left join generic_file gf on dr.generic_file_fk = gf.id left join tbl_item ti on gf.archive_item_name = ti.name left join tbl_item_version tiv on tbl_item_fk = ti.id where dr.fhir -> 'code' -> 'coding' -> 0 ->> 'code' = '11502-2') as lab
config.incrementing.column.name: id
config.timestamp.column.name: modified
